name: The Nowhere Place
description:
You don't know what happened. One moment you were somewhere. You don't remember where. The next moment you were... here. 

Where is here? ...Nowhere.

How do you get back? Can you? ...And what is that noise behind you?

______________________________________________________________________________________

The Nowhere Place is a short, surreal, minimalist horror game that draws loose inspiration from Slender and The Backrooms.

If creeping around an abstract space hunting for vague clues while dark figures hunt YOU sounds like fun, this just might be the game for you!

The game has no save function as it is meant to be completed in a single sitting. A playthrough is approximately 15 minutes in length depending on how many times you get snacked on and how quickly you find the notes.

Currently only available for windows.
